name: Justice (itch)
description:
This is Justice, a turn-based strategy game where you control your units in an attempt to outmaneuver and flank your opponent. This positional-based combat creates many interesting and fun tactical moments, even further improved by the ability to place different movement patterns on your units and using their abilities as efficiently as possible:

Choose between the noble Kingdom and the mighty Virulent, each equipped with their own unique 5 units:

Play a tournament where you steadily unlock new units as you progress:

Also included is a map editor, where you can create your own maps, which get randomly selected during play. 


Even without making maps, you still get a default one to play on, so don't worry! Thanks for checking the game out, hope you enjoy the ideas! You can see the whole process behind this game on my website here!
